name: Captain Says
description:
Welcome to Captain Says!
The aliens are invading your screen! Follows your captain's commands to shoot at the right shapes, but be careful - the Aliens will try to LIE to you. If you get a command from the aliens, you have to do the opposite! 

- Be careful out there trooper.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys - Move

Click - Shoot

Made in 1 week for the Community Game jam 2019
